title: Govt looking into governance lapses that happened at NSE: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman - Economic Times
content: Govt looking into governance lapses that happened at NSE: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman  Economic Times
description: The regulator also imposed a fine of Rs 3 crore on Ramkrishna, Rs 2 crore each on the NSE, Narain and Subramanian and Rs 6 lakh on V R Narasimhan, who was then the Chief Regulatory Officer and Chief Compliance Officer.
